```{r}
procedure<-function(periode){
toCache_=ifelse(periode=="daily",F,T)
p<-generer_graphique(actif,periode,toCache=toCache_)

analyse_opportunite(periode = periode,type=type)  
return(p)
}
```

```{r}
print(Sys.time())
```
